articles.description: OPINION: The All Blacks won the Tri Nations but Stuff's XV from the competition also reflects the contribution made by Argentina.

OPINION: The Tri Nations wrapped up on Saturday with a 16-16 draw between the Wallabies and Los Pumas to guarantee that the All Blacks won the abbreviated tournament.
